categories: Category:Lost Tribe of the Sith series

nodes.text: Star Wars: Lost Tribe of the Sith

Star Wars: Lost Tribe of the Sith is a Star Wars Legends eBook series that serves as a prequel to the Star Wars: Fate of the Jedi novel series. Written by John Jackson Miller, it begins in 5000 BBY and provides backstory for the Lost Tribe of Sith, a Sith organization that resurfaces in the galaxy in 43.5 ABY and plays a pivotal role in the Fate of the Jedi series. A total of eight eBooks was planned for the series although a ninth and final novella was eventually written and included in Star Wars: Lost Tribe of the Sith: The Collected Stories.
